description: Self-learning hooks for {{component_name}}. Extracts patterns and learns from usage.

hooks.prompt: Analyze this session for learnable patterns related to {{component_purpose}}. Check: 1) User corrections - what did they fix? 2) Error resolutions - what problems were solved? 3) Repeated workflows - what patterns emerged? 4) Quality improvements - what could be better? Return JSON: {"learned": bool, "patterns": [{"type": "correction|resolution|workflow|quality", "description": "...", "confidence": 0.0-1.0}]}. If nothing learned, return {"learned": false, "patterns": []}.
